personalInfo.title: A lightweight JSON oriented resume generator for IT professionals

summary:
You are about to use cre8ive.cv â€“ a tool for generating a customizable and easily editable resume. Its data layer is a pure JSON which can be exported and reimported. The generator supports export to PDF format. You can use a variety of themes and colors. The app respects your privacy â€“ no personal data is stored on the server side after rendering your JSON to PDF. For extra security you can also self-host it on your own local machine.
Below you can find the project authorâ€™s contact information.

responsibilities: Built and maintained React frontends backed by Node.js services
Improved API performance and added request tracing
Mentored interns on code quality and delivery practices
Implemented UI features and bug fixes in a customer dashboard
Wrote integration tests for critical user flows
Collaborated with designers to refine UX details
